description: Single storey part-width rear extension; alterations to existing verandah; and internal partitions (following the removal of two glazed timber doors, one upvc glazed door, one window; demolition of part of rear wall at ground floor level; and infilling of the single door and window openings).
decision_conditions: The proposal by reason of its design, scale, materials, appearance and level of intervention in the historic building fabric would result in a development that fails to respect the architectural integrity of the building which is Grade II listed and within the Norwood Green Conservation Area. As such, the proposal would be contrary to Section 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework, policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), the Norwood Green Conservation Area Appraisal and the Norwood Green Conservation Area Management Plan.
